text: Marco or Bartolomeo Genovesini (active 1628) was an Italian painter or two brothers of the Roverio family who were painters, and active in the Augustinian Monastery and the Carthusian Monastery of Garignano in Milan.Storia pittorica della Italia: Indici generali, by Luigi Lanzi, page 65. This name should not be confused with the painter il Genovesino (Luigi Miradori). ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Milanese painters
title: Marco Genovesini
